General.Name: Central Motek Co Ltd
General.Description: CTR Mobility Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive parts. The company offers axle assembly, aluminum forging, steering, suspension, engine, front and rear brake axle module, power train, and transmission parts. The company was formerly known as CENTRAL MOTEK Co.Ltd. and changed its name to CTR Mobility Co.,Ltd. in April 2023. CTR Mobility Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
